title: Companion Approval Guide

phael's Old Enemy

Kill Raphael's Old Enemy

Requirements/Details:

Make Raphael tell the back story about Astarion's scar. Defeated the Rats Defeated Lythridor Astarion will be extremely angry with this action Astarion will break up with you if you do this.
